title: Bug 11280 - Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the Java IDE, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 
2. Double click the title bar to maximize it. 
3. Switch to the resource perspective. 
4. Switch back to the Java perspective.
